title: Expert insights on Ethereum; traders explore Filecoin and Borroe Finance
description: Ethereum will update next year. Meanwhile, investors are monitoring Borroe Finance and Filecoin as they diversify portfolios

title: Move over, Waymo: web3 levels the playing field for self-driving cars | Opinion
description: Embracing the web3 self-sovereign data paradigm is the best chance for the self-driving vehicle industry to unlock its true potential and gain mass adoption

title: Bitwise Debuts Bitcoin Ad With “The Most Interesting Man in the World”
description:
Bitwise, a US-based index managing firm, has launched a spot Bitcoin ETF ad campaign titled “Bitcoin is Interesting”. The campaign aims to broaden the awareness of Bitwise as a leading firm in the crypto asset class as global interest in the industry surges. Announcing the campaign launch, Bitwise posted a clip of the ad on […]

The post Bitwise Debuts Bitcoin Ad With “The Most Interesting Man in the World” appeared first on Coin Edition.
